text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In der Hoch-Obrigkeitl. Buchtruckerey zu Bern sind folgende Bücher in gar geringem Preiß zu haben, als: 1. <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. H Ringieri</AUTHOR> <TITLE>CX. Conciones de Coena Dominic.</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Vol.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1680</YEAR>. das Exemplar in albo achthalben <PRICE>bz.</PRICE></BIBL> 2. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rissenii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Summa Theolog.</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1703</YEAR>. à <PRICE>10. Batzen,</PRICE> und auff Schreib-papier <PRICE>14. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 3. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Rodolphi</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Compend. Theol. Christ</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern</PLACE> <YEAR>1713</YEAR>. à <PRICE>8 Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 4. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Altmanns</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Catechetischer Leüchter und Rauchwerck, d. i. Erklärung und Gebätt über den Heydelbergischen Catechismum,</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> <YEAR>1711</YEAR>. mit dem Kupffer-Blatt haltet <PRICE>15. und ein halben Bogen,</PRICE> à <PRICE>5. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 5. <BIBL><TITLE>Biblia Piscatoris</TITLE> <FORMAT>in 4to.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern,</PLACE> à <PRICE>15. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL> 6. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Seelmatters</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Ewig- vest-bestehender Berg Zion, oder: der vest-gegründete unüberwindliche Gnaden-Stand der Kinderen GOttes,</TITLE> gründlich vorgestellt über die Worte des 125. Psalms <FORMAT>v. 1.</FORMAT> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Bern.</PLACE> <YEAR>1704</YEAR>. à <PRICE>5. Batzen.</PRICE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":12,"explanation":"Fixed the following issues: 1) Corrected \"und folgende B√ºcher\" to \"sind folgende Bücher\" for proper grammar and removed encoding errors. 2) Fixed \"Prei√ü\" to \"Preiß\". 3) Corrected \"Ccena\" to \"Coena\" in the first title. 4) Fixed \"Eremplar\" to \"Exemplar\". 5) Changed inconsistent \"PRIZE\" tags to \"PRICE\" tags throughout. 6) Replaced \"√†\" symbols with \"à\" (meaning \"at/for\" in pricing context). 7) Fixed \"Le√ºchter\" to \"Leüchter\" and \"Erkl√§rung\" and \"Geb√§tt\" to proper German spelling. 8) Corrected \"Kupffer-Btatt\" to \"Kupffer-Blatt\". 9) Fixed \"Rein\" to \"Bern\" in item 5 (likely OCR error). 10) Fixed \"gr√ºndlich\" to \"gründlich\" and \"un√ºberwindliche\" to \"unüberwindliche\". 11) Changed \"9. 1.\" to \"v. 1.\" (verse 1) which makes more sense for Psalm reference. 12) Fixed closing tag from \"</PRICE>\" to \"</PRICE>\" in the last item."}

parsed.explanation: Fixed the following issues: 1) Corrected "und folgende B√ºcher" to "sind folgende Bücher" for proper grammar and removed encoding errors. 2) Fixed "Prei√ü" to "Preiß". 3) Corrected "Ccena" to "Coena" in the first title. 4) Fixed "Eremplar" to "Exemplar". 5) Changed inconsistent "PRIZE" tags to "PRICE" tags throughout. 6) Replaced "√†" symbols with "à" (meaning "at/for" in pricing context). 7) Fixed "Le√ºchter" to "Leüchter" and "Erkl√§rung" and "Geb√§tt" to proper German spelling. 8) Corrected "Kupffer-Btatt" to "Kupffer-Blatt". 9) Fixed "Rein" to "Bern" in item 5 (likely OCR error). 10) Fixed "gr√ºndlich" to "gründlich" and "un√ºberwindliche" to "unüberwindliche". 11) Changed "9. 1." to "v. 1." (verse 1) which makes more sense for Psalm reference. 12) Fixed closing tag from "</PRICE>" to "</PRICE>" in the last item.
